text:
[Verse]
Night falls on the city
Lights are shining bright
Walking through the shadows
Moon above so high

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the distance
Stars are twinkling soft
Lost in the moment
Time is ticking off

[Chorus]
Under the stars we glow
Dancing in the night slow
Under the stars we dream
Everything feels so free

[Verse 3]
Paths cross in the dark
Hearts start to spark
Magic in the air
Feel it everywhere

[Verse 4]
Night is our blanket now
Holding hands wow
Eyes meet can't turn away
Let's leave and fly away

[Chorus]
Under the stars we glow
Dancing in the night slow
Under the stars we dream
Everything feels so free
title: Under the Stars
